structure.unit: Crimes, Punishments And Proceedingsin Criminal Cases
Search Warrants, Rewards, Fugitives From Justice, Arrest, Examination, Commitment And Bail. Probation Officers And Board Of Probation

law.catch_line: Annual Report Of Commissioner To General Court
law.text: The commissioner of probation shall make an annual report to the general court of the probation work of the courts for the year ending on December thirty-first preceding. The report shall include such information as the commissioner may consider useful, with his suggestions or recommendations.
